title: Design Concept Generation Using Machine Learning: Case-Based Learning

context.prior_knowledge: Basic understanding of machine learning and mathematical modeling, along with engineering design principles
context.additional_context: Learners utilize pre-produced lecture videos, interactive simulations, and datasets via LMS, with continuous learning through weekly assignments and feedback

learning_goals: Learners can explain machine learning problem-definition methods suitable for the design domain.
Learners can specify a Target Representation based on design examples.
Learners can implement a concept formation-based design generation model by analyzing bridge design cases.
Learners can evaluate the impact of training data types and representation methods on design concept generation.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
